line_1: "How canst thou bear to be from me disloin'd?
line_2: "To vice, in me let guilt adopted find

line_1: "How canst thou bear to be from me disloin'd?
line_2: "Thy proof of justice, mixt with mercy kind! "

line_1: "How canst thou bear to be from me disloin'd?
line_2: "— Oh! strange request (quoth she) of pity blind!
